org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.auth
Class FileAuthTokenProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.auth.AbstractAuthTokenProvider
      org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.auth.FileAuthTokenProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthTokenProvider
public class FileAuthTokenProvider
extends AbstractAuthTokenProvider

An authentication token provider that persists the token to a file. The authentication token must be encoded in UTF-8 and be the only contents of hte file.

SLF4J is used for logging.

Author:
David R. Bild

Method Detail

readToken

protected AuthToken readToken()
                       throws IOException
Description copied from class: AbstractAuthTokenProvider
Gets the current authentication token.

This method is not guaranteed to be called after each AbstractAuthTokenProvider.writeToken(AuthToken) call, because this class implements authentication token caching.

Specified by:
readToken in class AbstractAuthTokenProvider
Returns:
the current authentication token.
Throws:
IOException - if the current token could not be retrieved.
